projects.name: Electricity Billing System
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly interface (GUI) for users to interact with the system. Record meter readings for each customer during a billing period. Add, view, edit, and delete customer information. Calculate electricity bill based on consumption. Generate detailed bills.

projects.name: Attendance Management System
projects.description: Utilized JDBC to interact effectively between the Java application and the MySQL database for data persistence and retrieval. Designed the systems architecture, including database schema, user roles and functionalities. Demonstrated strong testing and debugging skills to ensure the systems functionality and reliability.

projects.name: Notes App
projects.description: Implemented core functionalities like creating, viewing, and editing notes. Utilized layouts (XML) to design a user-friendly interface with a RecyclerView for note list display and a dedicated editing activity. Strengthened understanding of core Android development concepts.

projects.name: Uber Data Analysis
projects.description: Used Python libraries (Pandas, Matplotlib, NumPy, Scikit-learn) for data analysis, feature engineering and model building.

experiences.description: Utilized ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to extract data from various sources, transform it for analysis, and load it into target systems. Implemented data integration tasks using Talend, a popular ETL tool. Gained proficiency in using Linux commands for server management and task automation. Extracted data from cloud servers and REST APIs for further processing and analysis. Collaborated effectively within a team environment to achieve project goals.

full_output.name: Pankhuri Baranwal
achievements_and_awards: Have a LeetCode contest rating of 1600+ and have solved over 200 questions.
